info.card_description: A funky minimalist cocktail generator using CocktailDB
info.description: Playfully designed, inspired by pastel 70's vibe using CocktailDB. It randomly retrieves a random cocktail recipe. Made for bartenders who need to brainstorm ideas for drink specials, and party people!
bulletPoints: Optimized for accessability by implementing micro-interactions with keyboard events
Implemented a hidden history menu to maximize screen real-estate
Implemented physics based animations using React-Spring

info.card_description: Real-time chat app in the style of AIM and Windows XP using websockets
info.description: A real-time chat application using websockets via socket.io. Made in the the style of AIM from the early 2000s. Allows a user to create a ScreenName and private room, other users can join that room given the code and chat with each other. Yes, it even contains those familiar AIM notification sounds!
bulletPoints: Developed a realtime chat application in the style of AIM from windows XP
Implemented websockets w/ socket.io to allow for realtime updates between users
Implemented notification sounds of the original AOL messenger

info.card_description: Photography portfolio and E-commerce store powered by Stripe
info.description: A desktop/mobile friendly website to host my personal photography projects. Has a print store which uses the prebuilt checkout from the Stripe API. Store cart state migrated from Context API to Redux Toolkit.
bulletPoints: Implemented payment and billing functionality via Stripe API
Reduced global content delivery wait times by deploying to a CDN (Cloud Distributed Network)
Implemented a mobile first design providing users an improved viewing experience on mobile devices
Improved user experience using physics based animations w/ React-Spring
Implemented Redux Toolkit to manage state

info.description: A fullstack webapp to create Teams and add members via a randomly generated code. Allows a user to join other teams, see their announcements, and post their own announcements via TipTap rich text editor. Made to make team managment and organization simpler.
bulletPoints: Implemented user authentication and verification to secure sensitive user and application data using Firebase
Implemented a rich text editor called TipTap that converts HTML to JSON and vice versa
Implemented a database that stores user data in a NoSQL format w/ MongoDB
Improved accessibility by utilizing Radix primitives
Optimized state management by a lightweight Redux alternative, Zustand

info.card_description: Fullstack serverless movie checking application using Firebase
info.description: A fullstack serverless application which queries the TMDB database for currently and upcoming films depending on the country you select. Allows a user to create an account, login, and save/delete movies to & from their watchlist which is stored in a database
bulletPoints: Implemented user authentication/storage via Firebase
User data is and saved movies are saved in Firestore DB
Implemented session storage to retain correctly chosen country of choise
Fully responsive, changes based on device screen size

info.card_description: Lightning fast JAMStack blog using AstroJS Framework
info.description: A clean and lightning fast jamstack blog to host my thoughts on cinema. Uses AstroJS to ship the least amount of code possible to increase page speed. This method also greatly improves SEO
bulletPoints: Implements partial hydration philosophy to deliver javascript only where necessary
Fully responsive design
Simplified navigation by using file-based routing
Built with AstroJS framework
